backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor providing access control, content management, gallery items, enquiries, and user profiles with admin/user permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented admin-auth features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short summaries of key frontend admin-auth related files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS config with color variables and theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry page mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the React router, site layout, public pages, and protected admin route with theme provider.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminFloat: Floating button that opens the admin login modal.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminLogin: Modal handling admin username/password login using useAdminAuth and redirecting on success.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Protects admin routes by checking session authentication and showing login UI if unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/admin/analytics/: Static placeholder analytics dashboard with cards for upcoming visitor and page view metrics.
frontend/src/components/admin/contact/Co: Form UI for viewing and updating contact details using query hooks and save mutation.
frontend/src/components/admin/content/Co: CRUD interface for content sections with dialogs for creating, editing, and deleting sections.
frontend/src/components/admin/enquiries/: Lists, reads, and deletes enquiries with a detail dialog and read-status handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/gallery/Ga: Manages gallery items including upload, create, edit, and delete with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter and save their profile name.
frontend/src/components/forms/EnquiryFor: Public form for submitting enquiries, validating fields, and showing a success message.
frontend/src/components/home/GalleryPrev: Displays up to six active gallery items or fallback images and links to the full gallery.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders footer with logo, quick links, contact details from API, and social media icons.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Shows site header with logo, desktop and mobile navigation, and active route highlighting.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Wraps the app with header, footer, page tracking, admin button, and profile setup modal.
frontend/src/content/defaultContent.ts: Defines default content sections for multiple site pages with titles, bodies, and publish flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAuth.ts: Handles admin login via session token with temporary credential check and logout logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Manages admin session tokens in localStorage with expiration handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context using DFINITY AuthClient with login and identity management.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageViewTracking.t: Hook that triggers a non-blocking page view tracking call whenever the route path or actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating content sections, gallery items, enquiries, and other backend data via an actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSiteContent.ts: Provides helpers to fetch content sections with fallback to default content and exposes loading state and all sections.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode styles, transitions, and accessibility focus styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point that renders the app wrapped with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page by displaying multiple content sections sourced via useSiteContent.
frontend/src/pages/AcademicsPage.tsx: Displays academic-related content sections using cards and updates the page title on mount.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Provides an admin dashboard with tabbed management for content, gallery, enquiries, contact details, and analytics, plus logout handling.
frontend/src/pages/AdmissionsPage.tsx: Shows admissions content, provides prospectus download, and includes an enquiry form.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders contact information, optional map embed, and a contact enquiry form using data from useGetContactDetails.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Displays gallery items with category filtering using tabs and shows active images in a responsive grid.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero text, features, programs, testimonials, and a gallery preview using site content sections.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing site requirements, architecture notes, known issues, and implemented features for the school website.
